item.title: Large puddle in road with pedestrians getting soaked by passing car., 17th September
item.description:
This was attended to sometime ago with only half of the area filled in! All pavements in Birdlip need a thorough inspection and all problems rectified before an elderly person has a fall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Birdlip, Cotswold

item.title: Returning potholes, 17th September
item.description:
This has been refilled at a cost of thousands so many times but is coming back, just in time for the winter months. There are more fillings than a Victorian dentist. It’s about time this section of road is resurfaced and the drainage from the field sorted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsing road, 17th September
item.description:
Before the junction just before turning left for churchdown from shurdington, there have been roadworks. What ever is under the works is in the process of collapsing. This is entirely across the road. It has been slowly getting worse. It’s now not avoidable and is going to cause damage again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 17th September
